instruction: Create a poem about friendship using the following words: joy, love, mystery.
output:
Friendship is a special joy,
Filled with love and mystery.
Our bond is deep, our friendship true,
And we can share eternity.
Our hearts will heal together,
Through sadness and bad weather.
The love we have is undying,
As a bond no one can defying.
A joy that'll never ever leave, 
No matter sorrow or bereavement.
Our hearts in friendship bound, 
Forever will be found.
